para_P.title: Will OpenAI's ChatGPT be broadly accessible in the European Union by June 30, 2024, or will the associated market have a minimum of 377 traders by the conclusion of July 15, 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered **YES** if at least one of the following conditions is met: 

(a) OpenAI's ChatGPT is broadly accessible in the European Union on June 30, 2024. "Broadly accessible" indicates that the standard situation for individuals in the EU is that they can reach it without utilizing a VPN (possibly necessitating payment). If it is not accessible in specific EU nations, or not available to certain demographics (such as minors), it will still be deemed positive if over 50% of the populace can access it. "ChatGPT" denotes the general web interface for engaging with GPT models, and will be considered positive if the service remains largely unchanged, even if the title or website undergoes modifications.

(b) The associated market (https://manifold.markets/embed/Mira_/how-many-traders-will-this-market-g) has a minimum of 377 traders prior to the market's closure (July 15, 11:59 PM Pacific Time). It will resolve as NO if fewer than 377 traders are registered by this time.

question.title: Will Joe Biden die before Saturday?
question.body:
Resolves YES if there is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. 

Otherwise, resolves NO.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden not die before Saturday?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if there is no official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. 

Otherwise, resolves NO.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Joe Biden will pass away before Saturday?
para_P.body:
This will be considered a YES if there is an official declaration of Joe Biden's death prior to the market closing on Friday, July 26th. 

If not, it will be a NO.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) The 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee will be a Woman (b) Joe Biden will not die before Saturday?
question.body:
This question resolves to “yes” if both of the following conditions are met: 

(a) The Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.
(b) There is no official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th.

It resolves to “no” if either or both of these conditions are not met.

not_P.title: Will either of the following not occur: (a) The 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee will be a Woman (b) Joe Biden will die before Saturday?
not_P.body:
This question resolves to “yes” if either of the following conditions are not met: 

(a) The Democratic delegates do not select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.
(b) There is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th.

It resolves to “no” if both of these conditions are met.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will take place: (a) A Woman will be the Democratic Presidential Nominee for 2024 (b) Joe Biden will still be alive by Saturday?
para_P.body:
This inquiry concludes with a “yes” if both of these criteria are satisfied: 

(a) A female candidate is chosen by the Democratic delegates as the presidential nominee for the upcoming 2024 election.
(b) There is no formal declaration of Joe Biden's passing prior to the market's closure at the end of Friday, July 26th.

It will result in a “no” if either or both of these criteria are not fulfilled.

question.title: Will either Joe Biden die before Saturday or the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee be a Woman?
question.body:
This question resolves YES if either of the following conditions are met: (a) There is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. (b) The Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election. 

If neither condition is met, it resolves NO.

not_P.title: Will neither Joe Biden die before Saturday nor the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee be a Woman?
not_P.body:
This question resolves YES if neither of the following conditions are met: (a) There is no official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. (b) The Democratic delegates do not select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election. 

If either condition is met, it resolves NO.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Joe Biden will pass away before Saturday or that the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee will be a Woman?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered YES if at least one of the following scenarios occurs: (a) An official declaration of Joe Biden's passing is made prior to the market's closure on Friday, July 26th. (b) A female candidate is chosen as the presidential nominee by the Democratic delegates for the 2024 election. 

If neither scenario occurs, it will be deemed NO.

question.title: Will Russia have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any of the following categories:



- Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine

- Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Assessed Russian Control

- Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location



The question will resolve as **No** if the location is not assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to:



- Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives

- Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location

not_P.title: Will Russia not have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) does not show the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any of the following categories:



- Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine

- Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Assessed Russian Control

- Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location



The question will resolve as **No** if the location is assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to:



- Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives

- Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location.

para_P.title: Will Russia gain dominance over Chasiv Yar by June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if, upon review by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) indicates the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E fall under any of the subsequent classifications:



- Evaluated Russian Progress in Ukraine

- Evaluated Russian Gains within the Last 24 Hours

- Evaluated Russian Control

- Asserted Russian Territory in Ukraine

- Any additional classifications established by ISW that signify Russian dominance over the area



The inquiry will be deemed **No** if the location is not classified under any categories that suggest Russian dominance, which includes but is not restricted to:



- Documented Ukrainian Territorial Gains within the Last 24 Hours

- Asserted Ukrainian Counteroffensives

- Documented Ukrainian Partisan Activity

- Any other classifications created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian dominance over the area or a lack of Russian dominance over the area.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President, and (b) Russia does not have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This resolves as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this resolves as No.

(b) Will Russia not have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?

This resolves as Yes if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any categories indicating Ukrainian control or a lack of Russian control. It resolves as No if the location is in any categories indicating Russian control, including assessed Russian advance, gains, or control, or claimed Russian territory in Ukraine.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following not occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President, or (b) Russia has control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden not announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This resolves as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign does not make a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a statement is made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this resolves as No.

(b) Will Russia have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?

This resolves as Yes if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under categories indicating Russian control, including assessed Russian advance, gains, or control, or claimed Russian territory in Ukraine. It resolves as No if the location is in any categories indicating Ukrainian control or a lack of Russian control.

para_P.title: Are both of the following events going to take place: (a) Joe Biden declares before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President, and (b) Russia does not hold control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) Is it true that Joe Biden will announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

This will be considered Yes if, prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a clear, public, official statement that he will not seek or accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. The declaration must be explicit and definitive, leaving no possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such an announcement is not made before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this will be considered No.

(b) Is it the case that Russia will not control Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?

This will be considered Yes if, when checked by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map indicates the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as falling under any categories reflecting Ukrainian control or a lack of Russian control. It will be considered No if the location falls under any categories indicating Russian control, including assessed Russian advance, gains, or control, or claimed Russian territory in Ukraine.

question.title: Will either Russia have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, or will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President?
question.body:
This question will resolve as Yes if either of the following occurs: (a) Russia is assessed to have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, according to the ISW map criteria, or (b) Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, that he will not seek and will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 cycle.

Details for (a): This part will resolve as Yes if, according to the ISW map accessed on June 1, 2024, the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E are under categories indicating Russian control, such as "Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine" or similar categories. It will resolve as No if the location is not under categories indicating Russian control.

Details for (b): This part will resolve as Yes if Joe Biden makes an unambiguous and conclusive statement before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination. If no such statement is made by then, it will resolve as No.

not_P.title: Will neither Russia have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, nor will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will accept the Democratic nomination for President?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Yes if neither of the following occurs: (a) Russia is assessed to have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, according to the ISW map criteria, nor (b) Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, that he will accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 cycle.

Details for (a): This part will resolve as Yes if, according to the ISW map accessed on June 1, 2024, the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E are not under categories indicating Russian control. It will resolve as No if the location is under categories indicating Russian control.

Details for (b): This part will resolve as Yes if Joe Biden makes no unambiguous and conclusive statement before July 15, 2024, that he will accept the Democratic nomination. If such a statement is made by then, it will resolve as No.

para_P.title: By June 1, 2024, will Russia be in command of Chasiv Yar, or will Joe Biden declare prior to July 15, 2024, that he will decline the Democratic nomination for President?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be deemed Yes if either of the following conditions is met: (a) On June 1, 2024, it is determined that Russia has control over Chasiv Yar based on the ISW map criteria, or (b) Joe Biden or his campaign issues a clear, public, official statement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, indicating that he will not pursue and will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 election cycle.

For condition (a): This aspect will be considered Yes if, according to the ISW map as of June 1, 2024, the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E fall under classifications that denote Russian control, such as "Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine" or similar classifications. It will be considered No if the location does not fall under classifications indicating Russian control.

For condition (b): This aspect will be considered Yes if Joe Biden makes a clear and definitive announcement before July 15, 2024, stating that he will not accept the Democratic nomination. If such an announcement is not made by that date, it will be considered No.

question.title: Will a group of at least 5 named Dem House Members or US Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20th?
question.body:
Politico reports:

Two safe-seat members have already publicly urged Biden out. Two of the most endangered Democrats told local news outlets they’ve already written off Biden’s chances to win in November.

Behind the scenes, things are even more frenzied. There are multiple drafts of letters circulating among House Democrats and at least one would call on Biden to end his campaign, according to five people familiar with the efforts.

This market resolves YES if a group of at least five named Democratic Party US House Members/US Senators work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time).

This could be by signing a letter like what is reported above, but it could also be in another form such as a group speaking with Biden in person and collectively asking him to drop out.

This market requires that all five individuals be part of the same group message. Five people separately telling reporters they think Biden should drop out is not sufficient for a YES resolution.

Reports of any number of unnamed democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this market's criteria unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before this market's end date. In any ambiguous cases where such names are reported but not confirmed beyond a reasonable doubt, this market will err towards resolving NO. 

If these criteria are not met before July 20th, this market resolves NO.

not_P.body:

This market resolves YES if a group of fewer than five named Democratic Party US House Members/US Senators do not work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time).

This could be by signing a letter like what is reported above, but it could also be in another form such as a group speaking with Biden in person and collectively asking him to drop out.

This market requires that all five individuals be part of the same group message. Five people separately telling reporters they think Biden should drop out is not sufficient for a YES resolution.

Reports of any number of unnamed democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this market's criteria unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before this market's end date. In any ambiguous cases where such names are reported but not confirmed beyond a reasonable doubt, this market will err towards resolving NO. 

If these criteria are not met before July 20th, this market resolves NO.

para_P.title: Will at least five identified Democratic House Members or Senators urge Biden to withdraw before July 20th?
para_P.body:
According to Politico:

Two members from secure districts have already called for Biden to step aside. Additionally, two of the most vulnerable Democrats have indicated to local media that they believe Biden's chances for victory in November are slim.

Behind the scenes, the situation is even more intense. Various drafts of letters are being circulated among House Democrats, with at least one draft suggesting that Biden should terminate his campaign, as reported by five individuals familiar with the situation.

This market will resolve to YES if a coalition of at least five named Democratic Party US House Members or US Senators collaborates to request that Joe Biden consider withdrawing from his 2024 re-election campaign before Saturday, July 20th (Pacific Time).

This could occur through a letter similar to what has been mentioned above, or it might take the form of a group meeting with Biden in person to collectively urge him to step down.

For this market to resolve YES, all five individuals must be part of the same collective communication. If five individuals separately express to the media that they believe Biden should withdraw, that will not be adequate for a YES resolution.

Reports mentioning any number of unnamed Democrats asking Biden to step aside will not fulfill this market's requirements unless at least five qualifying names are publicly disclosed prior to the market's conclusion. In cases where names are reported but not verified beyond a reasonable doubt, this market will lean towards a NO resolution.

If these conditions are not satisfied before July 20th, this market will resolve to NO.

question.title: Will Taylor Swift cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine?
question.body:
Resolves YES if she appears in the movie in any role, even if it is just her voice used for a character. Will still resolve YES if she is not credited on IMDB, if it is still confirmed by independent sources. 

[image]https://people.com/will-taylor-swift-play-dazzler-in-deadpool-and-wolverine-8651310

not_P.title: Will Taylor Swift not cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if she does not appear in the movie in any role, even if it is just her voice used for a character. Will still resolve YES if she is not credited on IMDB, if it is still confirmed by independent sources. 

[image]https://people.com/will-taylor-swift-play-dazzler-in-deadpool-and-wolverine-8651310

para_P.title: Is it possible that Taylor Swift will make a cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine?
para_P.body: This will be resolved as YES if she is featured in the film in any capacity, including if only her voice is utilized for a character. It will also resolve YES even if she does not receive credit on IMDB, provided that independent sources confirm her involvement.

question.title: Will "Deadpool x Wolverine" have the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie AND will Taylor Swift not cameo in the movie?
question.body: This question resolves YES if both of the following conditions are met: (1) "Deadpool x Wolverine" grosses more than $284.5 million globally in its opening weekend according to reports, AND the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) reports it as the record for an R-rated movie release. (2) Taylor Swift does not appear in the movie "Deadpool x Wolverine" in any role, including voice roles. It will still resolve YES if she is not credited on IMDB and there are no independent sources confirming her appearance.

not_P.title: Will "Deadpool x Wolverine" not have the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie OR will Taylor Swift cameo in the movie?
not_P.body: This question resolves YES if at least one of the following conditions is met: (1) "Deadpool x Wolverine" grosses $284.5 million or less globally in its opening weekend according to reports, or the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) does not report it as the record for an R-rated movie release. (2) Taylor Swift appears in the movie "Deadpool x Wolverine" in any role, including voice roles, or she is credited on IMDB or there are independent sources confirming her appearance.

para_P.title: Will the opening weekend of "Deadpool x Wolverine" surpass all previous R-rated film debuts, and will Taylor Swift not make an appearance in the film?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with a YES if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) "Deadpool x Wolverine" earns more than $284.5 million worldwide during its opening weekend as reported, and the Hollywood Reporter (or similar outlet) declares it as the highest-grossing opening for an R-rated film. (2) Taylor Swift does not feature in "Deadpool x Wolverine" in any capacity, including voice roles. It will still be considered a YES if she is not listed on IMDB and there are no independent confirmations of her involvement.

question.title: Will either Taylor Swift cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine, or will Deadpool & Wolverine have the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie?
question.body:
This question resolves YES if either of the following occurs:

(a) Taylor Swift appears in the "Deadpool and Wolverine" movie in any role, even if it is just her voice used for a character. This will resolve YES even if she is not credited on IMDB, as long as it is confirmed by independent sources.

(b) The "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover movie grosses more than $284.5 million globally in its opening weekend and is reported by the Hollywood Reporter (or an equivalent publication) as the record for the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie. The BoxOfficeMojo numbers are considered unofficial until confirmed by the Hollywood press, and the target number is over $284.5 million internationally for the weekend.

not_P.title: Will neither Taylor Swift cameo in Deadpool nor will Deadpool & Wolverine have the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie?
not_P.body:
This question resolves YES if neither of the following occurs:

(a) Taylor Swift appears in the "Deadpool and Wolverine" movie in any role, even if it is just her voice used for a character. This will resolve YES even if she is not credited on IMDB, as long as it is confirmed by independent sources.

(b) The "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover movie grosses more than $284.5 million globally in its opening weekend and is reported by the Hollywood Reporter (or an equivalent publication) as the record for the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie. The BoxOfficeMojo numbers are considered unofficial until confirmed by the Hollywood press, and the target number is over $284.5 million internationally for the weekend.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that either Taylor Swift will appear in the Deadpool and Wolverine film, or that Deadpool & Wolverine will achieve the highest opening weekend ever for a movie rated R?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered YES if one of the following happens:

(a) Taylor Swift makes an appearance in the "Deadpool and Wolverine" film in any capacity, including just providing her voice for a character. This will count as YES even if she is not listed on IMDB, provided it is verified by independent sources.

(b) The "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover film earns over $284.5 million worldwide during its opening weekend and is reported by the Hollywood Reporter (or a similar publication) as the record for the highest opening weekend ever for an R-rated film. Numbers from BoxOfficeMojo are deemed unofficial until validated by the Hollywood press, with the target figure being over $284.5 million internationally for the weekend.

question.title: Will Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will Israel not carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Israel will execute a lethal strike inside Iran prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if, after the date this question is posed and before May 1, 2024, reliable reports suggest that an assault linked to Israel, taking place within the territory of Iran, has resulted in the fatalities of no fewer than five people.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Iran's Guardian Council includes Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name on its list of approved presidential candidates, and (b) Israel does not carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election, and (b) there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals between the date of this question's publication and May 1, 2024.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following not occur: (a) Iran's Guardian Council includes Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name on its list of approved presidential candidates, or (b) Israel carries out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is not met: (a) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election, or (b) there are credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals between the date of this question's publication and May 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is it possible for these two events to happen: (a) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name is added to the list of approved candidates by Iran's Guardian Council, and (b) Israel refrains from executing a lethal strike within Iran prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (a) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad appears on the list of eligible presidential candidates approved by Iran's Guardian Council for the upcoming election, and (b) there are no reliable reports suggesting that an Israeli attack within Iran has resulted in the deaths of at least five people from the time this question is posed until May 1, 2024.

question.title: Will either of the following occur before May 1, 2024: (a) Israel carries out a deadly attack within Iran (b) Iran's Guardian Council includes Mahmoud Ahmadinejad as an approved presidential candidate?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur before May 1, 2024: (a) Israel carries out a deadly attack within Iran (b) Iran's Guardian Council includes Mahmoud Ahmadinejad as an approved presidential candidate?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that one of the following will happen prior to May 1, 2024: (a) Israel executes a lethal strike inside Iran (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is listed as an accepted candidate by Iran's Guardian Council for the presidency?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if one of the following takes place: (a) After the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, reliable sources report that an attack attributed to Israel has occurred within Iran, resulting in the fatalities of at least five people. (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad appears on the Guardian Council's roster of eligible candidates for Iran's forthcoming presidential election.

question.title: Will Biden drop out before July 20?
question.body: If Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, this market will resolve to no.

not_P.title: Will Biden not drop out before July 20?
not_P.body: If Biden does not drop out and is able to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, this market will resolve to no.

para_P.title: Will Biden withdraw from the race prior to July 20?
para_P.body: In the event that Biden withdraws or becomes incapable of continuing his campaign before July 20 at midnight Eastern Time, this market will conclude with a yes. If not, it will conclude with a no.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Will Hurd be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election? (b) Biden not drop out before July 20?
question.body:
(a) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Will Hurd is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

(b) If Biden does not drop out and is able to continue the race past July 20 midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, this market will resolve to no.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following occur: (a) Will Hurd not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election? (b) Biden drop out before July 20?
not_P.body:
(a) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Will Hurd is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

(b) If Biden drops out before July 20 midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to no. Otherwise, this market will resolve to yes.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will happen: (a) Will Hurd be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election? (b) Will Biden remain in the race until after July 20?
para_P.body:
(a) This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Will Hurd is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will result in a **No**. This question is not limited to the candidates currently mentioned; additional options may emerge later.

For this inquiry, it does not matter who is nominated by the Republicans on election day in 2024; it is strictly based on who is appointed by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

(b) If Biden remains in the race and does not withdraw before July 20 at midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to yes. If he withdraws, it will resolve to no.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Biden drops out before July 20, 2024 (b) Will Hurd is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body: (a) Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue the race before July 20, 2024 midnight Eastern Time. (b) Will Hurd is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Biden does not drop out before July 20, 2024 (b) Will Hurd is not the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body: (a) Biden does not drop out and is able to continue the race before July 20, 2024 midnight Eastern Time. (b) Will Hurd is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens: (a) Biden withdraws from the race prior to July 20, 2024 (b) Hurd becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body: (a) Biden withdraws or is otherwise incapacitated from continuing his campaign before the clock strikes midnight Eastern Time on July 20, 2024. (b) Hurd is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024, and (b) Vivek Ramaswamy not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(a) The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

(b) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If any other candidate is selected, it will resolve as **Yes**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following not occur: (a) Donald Trump not be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024, or (b) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
(a) The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is not charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The indictments must not occur before June 1, 2024.

(b) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If he is selected, it will resolve as **Yes**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

para_P.title: Will both of the following take place: (a) Will Donald Trump face charges for witness tampering in Georgia prior to June 1, 2024, and (b) Will Vivek Ramaswamy not be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(a) The resolution is **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted concerning any remarks related to potential witnesses in *The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al*. The charges must be brought before June 1, 2024.

(b) This question resolves as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is not chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If any other individual is nominated, it will resolve as **Yes**. This inquiry is not limited to the candidates currently listed; additional candidates may emerge later.

For this question, it does not matter who is nominated by the Republican Party on the day of the 2024 US election; the outcome is determined solely by the choice made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election (b) Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?

not_P.body:
(a) This question will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. para_P.title: Is it possible that either of the following happens: (a) Vivek Ramaswamy becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election (b) Donald Trump faces charges for witness tampering in Georgia prior to June 1, 2024?

question.title: Will OpenAI publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, OpenAI publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

not_P.title: Will OpenAI not publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, OpenAI does not publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

para_P.title: Is it expected that OpenAI will release a public report detailing the findings from an outside red-team assessment of their models for safety before June 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **YES** if, on or before June 30, 2024, OpenAI issues a *public* report containing the results from an *external* organization that has conducted a red-team evaluation of the safety of one of their AI models.

question.title: Will both of the following occur by June 30, 2024: (a) Anthropic publishes a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety, and (b) OpenAI does not publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety?
question.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, both of the following conditions are met: (a) Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models; and (b) OpenAI does not publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following occur by June 30, 2024: (a) Anthropic does not publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety, or (b) OpenAI publishes a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, at least one of the following conditions is met: (a) Anthropic does not publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models; or (b) OpenAI publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

para_P.title: By June 30, 2024, will the following take place: (a) Anthropic releases a report detailing the findings from an independent review of their models regarding safety, and (b) OpenAI refrains from releasing a report detailing the findings from an independent review of their models regarding safety?
para_P.body: This question will be resolved as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, both of these conditions are satisfied: (a) Anthropic issues a *public* report with the findings from an *independent* assessment of the safety of one of their AI models; and (b) OpenAI does not issue a *public* report with the findings from an *independent* assessment of the safety of one of their AI models.

question.title: Will either OpenAI or Anthropic publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, either of the following occurs: (a) OpenAI publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models. (b) Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

not_P.title: Will neither OpenAI nor Anthropic publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, neither of the following occurs: (a) OpenAI publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models. (b) Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that OpenAI or Anthropic will release a report detailing the outcomes of external safety evaluations of their models by June 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This question will be considered **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, one of the following happens: (a) OpenAI issues a *public* report on the findings from an *external* red-teaming assessment of the safety of one of their AI models. (b) Anthropic issues a *public* report on the findings from an *external* red-teaming assessment of the safety of one of their AI models.

question.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democra...nomination for President?
question.body:
Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

This question will be marked as Yes if, before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a clear, public, official statement indicating that he will neither seek nor accept his party's nomination for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

For a Yes resolution, the statement must be clear and definitive: it should eliminate any possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the upcoming 2024 election.
