question.title: Will a swimmer win the most gold medals at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
question.body: The question resolves as **Yes** if the athlete with the highest number of 2024 Olympic gold medals competes in the swimming events.

not_P.title: Will no swimmer win the most gold medals at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
not_P.body: The question resolves as **Yes** if no athlete with the highest number of 2024 Olympic gold medals competes in the swimming events.

para_P.title: Is it possible for a swimmer to secure the highest number of gold medals at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with **Yes** if the competitor who achieves the greatest tally of gold medals at the 2024 Olympics participates in swimming events.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) The same nation wins more than one women's team sport at the 2024 Olympics (b) A swimmer does not win the most gold medals at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
question.body:
(a) The question about the same nation winning more than one women's team sport resolves as No if women's teams representing eight different National Olympic Committees (NOC) win gold in the eight team sports - association football, 3×3 basketball, 5×5 basketball, field hockey, handball, rugby sevens, volleyball, and water polo. Otherwise, the same NOC must have won at least two of these events, so the question resolves as Yes.

(b) The question about a swimmer not winning the most gold medals resolves as Yes if the athlete with the highest number of 2024 Olympic gold medals does not compete in the swimming events.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) The same nation wins more than one women's team sport at the 2024 Olympics (b) A swimmer wins the most gold medals at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
not_P.body:
(a) The question about the same nation winning more than one women's team sport resolves as Yes if women's teams representing eight different National Olympic Committees (NOC) win gold in the eight team sports - association football, 3×3 basketball, 5×5 basketball, field hockey, handball, rugby sevens, volleyball, and water polo. Otherwise, the same NOC must have won at least two of these events, so the question resolves as No.

(b) The question about a swimmer winning the most gold medals resolves as No if the athlete with the highest number of 2024 Olympic gold medals competes in the swimming events.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will take place: (a) A single country secures victories in more than one women's team competition at the 2024 Olympics (b) A swimmer fails to achieve the highest number of gold medals at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
para_P.body:
(a) The inquiry regarding whether a single country wins multiple women's team competitions is answered with No if women's teams from eight distinct National Olympic Committees (NOC) claim gold in the eight team sports - association football, 3×3 basketball, 5×5 basketball, field hockey, handball, rugby sevens, volleyball, and water polo. If not, then the same NOC must have triumphed in at least two of these events, leading to a Yes answer.

(b) The question concerning whether a swimmer does not secure the most gold medals is answered with Yes if the individual with the most 2024 Olympic gold medals does not take part in the swimming competitions.

question.title: Will either a swimmer win the most gold medals or the same nation win more than one women's team sport at the 2024 Olympics?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) The athlete with the highest number of 2024 Olympic gold medals competes in the swimming events. (b) The same National Olympic Committee (NOC) wins gold in more than one of the eight women's team sports: association football, 3×3 basketball, 5×5 basketball, field hockey, handball, rugby sevens, volleyball, and water polo. The question resolves as **No** if women's teams representing eight different NOCs win gold in these eight team sports.

not_P.title: Will neither a swimmer win the most gold medals nor the same nation win more than one women's team sport at the 2024 Olympics?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) The athlete with the highest number of 2024 Olympic gold medals competes in the swimming events. (b) The same National Olympic Committee (NOC) wins gold in more than one of the eight women's team sports: association football, 3×3 basketball, 5×5 basketball, field hockey, handball, rugby sevens, volleyball, and water polo. The question resolves as **No** if women's teams representing eight different NOCs win gold in these eight team sports.

para_P.title: Is it possible for a swimmer to secure the highest number of gold medals or for a single nation to triumph in multiple women's team sports at the 2024 Olympic Games?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if at least one of the following takes place: (a) The competitor who achieves the most gold medals at the 2024 Olympics participates in swimming events. (b) The same National Olympic Committee (NOC) claims gold in more than one of the eight women's team sports: association football, 3×3 basketball, 5×5 basketball, field hockey, handball, rugby sevens, volleyball, and water polo. Conversely, the question will be answered with **No** if women's teams from eight different NOCs each secure gold in these eight team sports.

question.title: On July 17, 2024, will Nvidia's market capitalization be larger than Apple's?
question.body: This question resolves Yes if, on July 17, 2024, the market cap of Nvidia is greater than that of Apple, according to Companies Market Cap, when checked by Metaculus at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

not_P.title: On July 17, 2024, will Nvidia's market capitalization not be larger than Apple's?
not_P.body: This question resolves Yes if, on July 17, 2024, the market cap of Nvidia is less than or equal to that of Apple, according to Companies Market Cap, when checked by Metaculus at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

para_P.title: Will Nvidia's market value exceed that of Apple on July 17, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will yield a Yes if Nvidia's market capitalization surpasses Apple's on July 17, 2024, based on the data from Companies Market Cap, as verified by Metaculus around 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) At least 5 named Democratic House Members or US Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20th, 2024 (b) Nvidia's market capitalization is less than or equal to Apple's on July 17, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Politico reports that two safe-seat members have already publicly urged Biden out. Two of the most endangered Democrats told local news outlets they’ve already written off Biden’s chances to win in November. Behind the scenes, things are even more frenzied. There are multiple drafts of letters circulating among House Democrats and at least one would call on Biden to end his campaign, according to five people familiar with the efforts. This resolves YES if a group of at least five named Democratic Party US House Members/US Senators work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time). This could be by signing a letter like what is reported above, but it could also be in another form such as a group speaking with Biden in person and collectively asking him to drop out. This requires that all five individuals be part of the same group message. Five people separately telling reporters they think Biden should drop out is not sufficient for a YES resolution. Reports of any number of unnamed democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before this end date. In any ambiguous cases where such names are reported but not confirmed beyond a reasonable doubt, this will err towards resolving NO. If these criteria are not met before July 20th, this resolves NO.

(b) This resolves Yes if, on July 17, 2024, the market cap of Nvidia is less than or equal to that of Apple, according to Companies Market Cap, when checked by Metaculus at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

not_P.title: Will not both of the following occur: (a) At least 5 named Democratic House Members or US Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20th, 2024 (b) Nvidia's market capitalization is greater than Apple's on July 17, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) It does not resolve YES if a group of at least five named Democratic Party US House Members/US Senators do not work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time). This means that five people separately telling reporters they think Biden should drop out is not sufficient for a YES resolution. Reports of any number of unnamed democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before this end date. In any ambiguous cases where such names are reported but not confirmed beyond a reasonable doubt, this will err towards resolving YES. If these criteria are met before July 20th, this resolves YES.

(b) This resolves NO if, on July 17, 2024, the market cap of Nvidia is less than or equal to that of Apple, according to Companies Market Cap, when checked by Metaculus at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will happen: (a) At least five named Democratic members of the House or Senate will urge Biden to withdraw from the race before July 20th, 2024, and (b) Nvidia's market valuation will be at most equal to that of Apple on July 17, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) Reports from Politico indicate that two secure-seat members have already publicly called for Biden to step aside. Additionally, two of the most vulnerable Democrats have expressed to local news that they believe Biden has no chance of winning in November. Behind the scenes, the situation is even more intense. Multiple drafts of letters are circulating among House Democrats, and at least one draft urges Biden to cease his campaign, as reported by five sources familiar with the matter. This will resolve YES if a collective of at least five identified Democratic Party US House Members or Senators collaborate to ask Joe Biden to contemplate ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to encourage him to do so, before Saturday, July 20th (Pacific Time). This could manifest as signing a letter as mentioned above, or it could take the form of a group meeting with Biden to jointly request that he withdraw. It is essential that all five individuals are part of the same collective message. If five individuals independently communicate to reporters their belief that Biden should withdraw, this will not be sufficient for a YES resolution. Reports of any number of unnamed Democrats writing to Biden requesting him to step aside will not fulfill this unless at least five qualifying names are disclosed publicly before the deadline. In cases where such names are reported but not confirmed beyond reasonable doubt, this will lean towards resolving NO. If these conditions are not satisfied by July 20th, this resolves NO.

(b) This will resolve Yes if, on July 17, 2024, Nvidia's market capitalization is less than or equal to Apple's, as per Companies Market Cap, verified by Metaculus around 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

question.title: Will either Nvidia's market capitalization surpass Apple's on July 17, 2024, or will at least 5 named Democratic House Members or Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20, 2024?
question.body:
This question resolves YES if either of the following occurs:

(a) On July 17, 2024, Nvidia's market capitalization is larger than Apple's. This will be determined by comparing their market caps on Companies Market Cap, as checked by Metaculus at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

(b) A group of at least 5 named Democratic Party US House Members or US Senators work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time). This can be through signing a letter or another form such as collectively speaking with Biden. All five individuals must be part of the same group message. In ambiguous cases, if the names are not confirmed beyond a reasonable doubt, the resolution will err towards NO. If these criteria are not met before July 20th, this part resolves NO.

question.title: Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a **Yes** resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as **No**.

To qualify for a **No** resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

question.title: Will Glenn Youngkin be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:

All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently listed; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will both of the following occur at the 2024 Paris Olympics: (a) France places in the Top 5 and (b) Sha'Carri Richardson fails to win a gold medal?

This question will resolve positively if both of the following conditions are met at the 2024 Paris Olympics:

(a) France places in the top 5 (ties resolve positively). The medal table is calculated by taking the total number of medals won by each participating country and ordering by:
1. Number of Gold Medals
2. (Where 1 is tied) Number of Silver Medals

question.title: Will GUE/NGL hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if GUE/NGL holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections and as **No** for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, both will resolve as **Yes**.

This question resolves on the basis of [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

not_P.title: Will GUE/NGL not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if GUE/NGL does not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections and as **No** for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, both will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will GUE/NGL secure the highest number of seats following the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if GUE/NGL secures the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections, and with **No** for all other political parties. In the event that two parties have an equal number of seats, both will be answered with **Yes**.

The resolution of this question will be based on [official announcements from the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or reliable news sources.

If Greens–EFA is tied for the most seats, condition (a) is still satisfied. If GUE/NGL is tied for the most seats, condition (b) is not satisfied.

This question resolves on the basis of [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

not_P.title: Will Greens–EFA not hold the most seats or GUE/NGL hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is met after the 2024 European Parliament elections: (a) The Greens–EFA political group does not hold the most seats, or (b) The GUE/NGL political group holds the most seats. If Greens–EFA is tied for the most seats, condition (a) is satisfied. If GUE/NGL is tied for the most seats, condition (b) is satisfied.

This question resolves on the basis of [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

para_P.title: Will the Greens–EFA secure the highest number of seats while the GUE/NGL fails to do so following the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if both of the subsequent criteria are fulfilled after the 2024 European Parliament elections: (a) The Greens–EFA political group has the highest number of seats, and (b) The GUE/NGL political group does not possess the highest number of seats. If the Greens–EFA is in a tie for the highest number of seats, condition (a) is still considered met. If the GUE/NGL is in a tie for the highest number of seats, condition (b) is not considered met.

This inquiry resolves based on [official statements from the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or reliable media sources.

question.title: Will either GUE/NGL or Greens–EFA hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either the GUE/NGL or the Greens–EFA political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. If two groups are tied for seats, both will resolve as **Yes**. The resolution is based on [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

not_P.title: Will neither GUE/NGL nor Greens–EFA hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither the GUE/NGL nor the Greens–EFA political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. If two groups are tied for seats, both will resolve as **No**. The resolution is based on [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

para_P.title: Will either GUE/NGL or Greens–EFA secure the highest number of seats following the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if either the GUE/NGL or the Greens–EFA political faction secures the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. In the case of a tie between two groups for the number of seats, both will be considered as **Yes**. The determination will be based on [official announcements from the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or reliable media sources.

question.title: Facing Joe Biden instead of a generic Democrat, will Trump gain at least 3% among Manifold respondents?
question.body:
There are two Manifold polls posted, which both close on July 6.  One of the polls asks Manifold respondents to vote with Joe Biden on a hypothetical ballot, and another asks respondents to vote with a generic Democrat on the hypothetical ballot.

@/SteveSokolowski/1-of-2-given-these-choices-who-woul@/SteveSokolowski/2-of-2-given-these-choices-who-woul 

Public opinion polls consistently show Joe Biden losing to Donald Trump outside the margin of error, but every other Democrat hypothetically surveyed polls ahead or within the margin of error.  Are Manifold respondents representative of the general public?

This market will resolve YES if the percentage of votes for Donald Trump in poll 1 exceeds that in poll 2 by 3% or more when both polls close.

The formula for determining the percentage of votes for Trump is (Trump / (Trump + (the Democrat in the question) + Someone else)).  The answer is YES if this formula for poll 1 - the formula for poll 2 >= 0.03.  Otherwise, it is NO.

The polls and this question will never resolve N/A, and will remain open until the close time no matter what.

para_P.title: If Trump competes against Joe Biden rather than an unnamed Democrat, will he secure at least a 3% advantage among Manifold voters?
para_P.body:
Two polls from Manifold are available, both closing on July 6. One poll asks Manifold participants to choose Joe Biden on a theoretical ballot, while the other asks them to select an unnamed Democrat on a similar ballot.

@/SteveSokolowski/1-of-2-given-these-choices-who-woul@/SteveSokolowski/2-of-2-given-these-choices-who-woul 

Surveys of public opinion frequently indicate that Joe Biden is trailing Donald Trump beyond the margin of error, yet all other Democrats surveyed hypothetically are either leading or are within the margin of error. Are the responses from Manifold participants indicative of the broader public?

This market will conclude with a YES if Trump's vote percentage in the first poll surpasses that in the second poll by 3% or more at the time both polls close.

To calculate Trump's vote percentage, use the formula (Trump / (Trump + (the Democrat in the question) + Someone else)). The result is YES if the calculation for poll 1 minus the calculation for poll 2 is greater than or equal to 0.03. If not, it will be NO.

The polls and this inquiry will not resolve as N/A and will stay open until the designated closing time regardless of circumstances.

question.title: Will Biden drop out before July 20?
question.body: If Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, this market will resolve to no.

not_P.title: Will Biden not drop out before July 20?
not_P.body: If Biden does not drop out and is able to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, this market will resolve to no.

para_P.title: Is it possible for Biden to withdraw from the race prior to July 20?
para_P.body: Should Biden decide to step down or be unable to pursue his campaign before midnight Eastern Time on July 20, this market will conclude with a yes. If not, it will conclude with a no.

question.title: Will Kamala Harris’ VP Pick be Kelly or Shapiro and Biden not drop out before July 20?
question.body:
This question resolves to YES if both of the following conditions are met: (1) Kamala Harris announces her pick for running mate being either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro, and (2) Joe Biden does not drop out and is able to continue the race until after July 20 midnight Eastern Time. 

The question resolves to NO if either Kamala Harris announces anyone else as her running mate or if Joe Biden drops out before July 20 midnight Eastern Time. 

For Kamala Harris' VP pick, the decision must be confirmed by Kamala herself before August 7th. For Joe Biden, he must remain in the race past July 20th midnight Eastern Time. 

Comment if you have any questions or news 💙

not_P.title: Will Kamala Harris’ VP Pick not be Kelly or Shapiro or Biden drop out before July 20?
not_P.body:
This question resolves to YES if either of the following conditions are met: (1) Kamala Harris announces her pick for running mate being someone other than Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro, or (2) Joe Biden drops out before July 20 midnight Eastern Time. 

The question resolves to NO if both Kamala Harris announces her pick for running mate being either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro and Joe Biden does not drop out and is able to continue the race until after July 20 midnight Eastern Time. 

For Kamala Harris' VP pick, the decision must be confirmed by Kamala herself before August 7th. For Joe Biden, he must remain in the race past July 20th midnight Eastern Time. 

Comment if you have any questions or news 💙

para_P.title: Will Kamala Harris choose either Kelly or Shapiro as her VP and will Biden remain in the race until after July 20?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered affirmative if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) Kamala Harris reveals her choice for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro, and (2) Joe Biden does not withdraw and is able to stay in the contest until after July 20 midnight Eastern Time. 

The inquiry will be deemed negative if either Kamala Harris selects someone else as her running mate or if Joe Biden withdraws prior to July 20 midnight Eastern Time. 

For Kamala Harris' selection of a VP, the decision must be made known by her before August 7th. For Joe Biden, he must persist in the race beyond July 20th midnight Eastern Time. 

Feel free to comment if you have any questions or updates 💙

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Biden drops out before July 20, or (b) Kamala Harris picks Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her VP by August 7?
question.body:
(a) This part of the question will resolve to YES if Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time. Otherwise, it will resolve to NO.

(b) This part of the question will resolve to YES if Kamala Harris announces her pick for running mate being either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro before August 7th. It will resolve to NO if she announces anyone else as her running mate. The resolution will wait until the pick is confirmed by Kamala herself.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Biden does not drop out before July 20, and (b) Kamala Harris does not pick Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her VP by August 7?
not_P.body:
(a) This part of the question will resolve to YES if Biden does not drop out and is able to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time. Otherwise, it will resolve to NO.

(b) This part of the question will resolve to YES if Kamala Harris announces her pick for running mate being neither Mark Kelly nor Josh Shapiro before August 7th. It will resolve to NO if she announces either of them as her running mate. The resolution will wait until the pick is confirmed by Kamala herself.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens: (a) Biden withdraws from the race prior to July 20, or (b) Kamala Harris selects Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro as her vice-presidential candidate by August 7?
para_P.body:
(a) This segment of the inquiry will be marked as YES if Biden withdraws or is otherwise unable to continue his campaign before midnight Eastern Time on July 20. If not, it will be marked as NO.

(b) This segment will be marked as YES if Kamala Harris declares her choice for running mate as either Mark Kelly or Josh Shapiro before August 7. It will be marked as NO if she chooses anyone else as her running mate. The resolution will depend on confirmation from Kamala herself regarding her choice.

question.title: Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there not be another Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is another presidential debate for the Democratic party expected?
para_P.body: This resolves to YES if a debate occurs among prospective Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It resolves to NO in other circumstances.

question.title: Will Kamala Harris be president by Friday and will there be no more Democratic party presidential debates?
question.body: This question resolves to "Yes" if both of the following conditions are met: (1) Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, based on official information from the US government or a consensus of credible reporting, and (2) there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g., Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves "No" if either or both conditions are not met.

not_P.title: Will Kamala Harris not be president by Friday or will there be more Democratic party presidential debates?
not_P.body: This question resolves to "Yes" if at least one of the following conditions is met: (1) Vice President Kamala Harris is not formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, based on official information from the US government or a consensus of credible reporting, or (2) there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g., Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves "Yes" if at least one of the conditions is not met.

para_P.title: Is it possible for Kamala Harris to assume the presidency by Friday and for there to be no further presidential debates for the Democratic party?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered "Yes" if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) Vice President Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, according to official announcements from the US government or a consensus of reliable news sources, and (2) there are no discussions among potential Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It will be deemed "No" if either or both of these criteria are not fulfilled.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Democratic National Convention or (b) Kamala Harris be formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

(b) This resolves to YES if Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, it resolves to NO. The primary resolution source for this will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Democratic National Convention nor (b) Kamala Harris be formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

(b) This resolves to YES if Vice President Kamala Harris is not formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, it resolves to NO. The primary resolution source for this will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

para_P.title: Is it possible that either of the following happens: (a) a subsequent Democratic party presidential debate takes place prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention, or (b) Kamala Harris is officially named as President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be marked as YES if a debate occurs among potential Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It will be marked as NO if no such debate occurs.

(b) This will be marked as YES if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, it will be marked as NO. The main source for resolution will be official US government announcements, but a consensus from reliable news reports will also be considered.

question.title: Will Australia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Australia participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Australia does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Australia not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Australia does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Australia qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Australia going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if Australia competes in a Semi-final and is subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Conversely, if Australia fails to qualify, the inquiry will be deemed **No**.

question.title: Will Latvia qualify and Australia fail to qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (b) Australia either does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Latvia does not qualify or Australia qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Latvia not qualify or Australia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is met: (a) Latvia does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Australia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both Latvia qualifies and Australia fails to qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will Latvia make it to the Grand Final while Australia does not in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if both of the following criteria are fulfilled: (a) Latvia competes in a Semi-final and is officially declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (b) Australia either does not compete in a Semi-final or is not officially declared by the EBU as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Latvia fails to qualify or Australia qualifies, the inquiry will be deemed **No**.

question.title: Will either Australia or Latvia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Australia participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. (b) Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Australia nor Latvia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Australia participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. (b) Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will Australia or Latvia make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if at least one of the following happens: (a) Australia competes in a Semi-final and is subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having made it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. (b) Latvia competes in a Semi-final and is subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having made it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither country qualifies, the answer will be **No**.

question.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

not_P.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be less than or equal to 3 or greater than 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden be more than 3 but no more than 4 according to 538's average of national polls?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be resolved based on the margin by which Donald Trump is ahead of Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as shown in the chart for July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this context, a positive figure indicates a lead for Trump, whereas a negative figure signifies Biden's lead. For instance, on July 5, 2024, the reported value indicates Trump is ahead by 2.4 points over Biden, which would be considered a positive value of 2.4 for the purpose of this question.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election and (b) Trump's lead over Biden be <= 3 or > 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
(a) Vivek Ramaswamy must be selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This selection is determined by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, regardless of who is the nominee on the day of the 2024 US election.

(b) On July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden must be less than or equal to 3 points or greater than 4 points. A positive value indicates a Trump lead, while a negative value indicates a Biden lead. The value is determined by the chart accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election nor (b) Trump's lead over Biden be > 3 and <= 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
(a) Vivek Ramaswamy must not be selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This selection is determined by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, regardless of who is the nominee on the day of the 2024 US election.

(b) On July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden must be neither less than or equal to 3 points nor greater than 4 points. A positive value indicates a Trump lead, while a negative value indicates a Biden lead. The value is determined by the chart accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

para_P.title: Is it possible for both of the following to take place: (a) Vivek Ramaswamy becoming the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election and (b) Trump's margin over Biden being <= 3 or > 4 on July 15, 2024, based on 538's national polling average?
para_P.body:
(a) Vivek Ramaswamy needs to be chosen by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This choice is made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, irrespective of who is nominated on the day of the 2024 US election.

(b) On July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden must be at most 3 points or exceed 4 points. A positive number signifies a Trump lead, while a negative number indicates a Biden lead. The figure is determined by the chart referred to by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, or (b) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(a) Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/). This will be resolved by checking the reported chart for July 15, 2024, as accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value means a Trump lead. For example, a value of 2.4 means Trump is 2.4 points ahead of Biden.

(b) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, regardless of who receives the nomination on the election day. It is determined by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, nor (b) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
(a) Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/). This will be resolved by checking the reported chart for July 15, 2024, as accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value means a Trump lead. For example, a value of 2.4 means Trump is 2.4 points ahead of Biden.

(b) Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This will resolve as **No** if Vivek Ramaswamy is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election, regardless of who receives the nomination on the election day. It is determined by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will either (a) Trump's advantage over Biden exceed 3 but not surpass 4, according to 538's national polling average, or (b) Vivek Ramaswamy be chosen as the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(a) Trump's advantage over Biden exceed 3 but not surpass 4 on July 15, 2024, based on 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/). This will be determined by reviewing the reported chart for July 15, 2024, as accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive figure indicates a Trump advantage. For instance, a figure of 2.4 indicates Trump is leading Biden by 2.4 points.

(b) Vivek Ramaswamy be selected as the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This will be marked as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is appointed by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election, irrespective of who is nominated on election day. This decision is made by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Ireland set to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Ireland competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having made it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Conversely, if Ireland fails to qualify, the inquiry will conclude with a **No**.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Cyprus qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024 and (b) Ireland fails to qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (1) Cyprus participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (2) Ireland either does not participate in a Semi-final or is officially announced by the EBU as not having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Cyprus does not qualify or Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Cyprus does not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024 or (b) Ireland qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following conditions are met: (1) Cyprus does not participate in a Semi-final or is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as not having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (2) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both Cyprus qualifies and Ireland fails to qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is it true that both (a) Cyprus makes it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024 and (b) Ireland does not make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) Cyprus competes in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having made it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (2) Ireland either does not compete in a Semi-final or is officially confirmed by the EBU as not having made it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. The outcome will be **No** if either Cyprus fails to qualify or Ireland qualifies.

question.title: Will either Ireland or Cyprus qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either (a) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Cyprus participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Ireland nor Cyprus qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Ireland nor Cyprus qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither (a) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, nor (b) Cyprus participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Ireland or Cyprus qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will either Ireland or Cyprus make it to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will result in **Yes** if either (a) Ireland competes in a Semi-final and is officially declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having made it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Cyprus competes in a Semi-final and is officially declared by the EBU as having made it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Ireland nor Cyprus makes it, the inquiry will result in **No**.

not_P.title: Will either of the following occur in Eurovision 2024: (a) Azerbaijan does not qualify for the Grand Final or (b) Lithuania qualifies for the Grand Final?

para_P.title: Will both of the following take place in Eurovision 2024: (a) Azerbaijan makes it to the Grand Final and (b) Lithuania does not make it to the Grand Final?

If either Azerbaijan fails to qualify or Lithuania qualifies, the question will be answered with **No**.

question.title: Will either Lithuania or Azerbaijan qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?

If either Lithuania or Azerbaijan qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will Lithuania or Azerbaijan make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?

If neither Lithuania nor Azerbaijan advances, the inquiry will be deemed **No**.

question.title: Between July 17 and July 28, 2024, will the strongest geomagnetic storm have a K-index ("Kp") greater than 4 and less than or equal to 5?
question.body: This question resolves Yes if the highest Planetary K-index ("Kp") between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is greater than 4 and less than or equal to 5, according to the German Research Center for Geosciences in their running 30-day history data product.

not_P.title: Between July 17 and July 28, 2024, will the strongest geomagnetic storm have a K-index ("Kp") less than or equal to 4 or greater than 5?
not_P.body: This question resolves Yes if the highest Planetary K-index ("Kp") between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is not greater than 4 or not less than or equal to 5, according to the German Research Center for Geosciences in their running 30-day history data product.

para_P.title: During the period from July 17 to July 28, 2024, will the peak geomagnetic storm reach a K-index ("Kp") that exceeds 4 but does not go beyond 5?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered affirmatively if the maximum Planetary K-index ("Kp") recorded between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is greater than 4 and at most 5, based on data from the German Research Center for Geosciences in their ongoing 30-day history data product.

question.title: Between July 17 and July 28, 2024, will the strongest geomagnetic storm have a K-index ("Kp") greater than 5 and less than or equal to 6?
question.body: This question resolves Yes if the highest Planetary K-index ("Kp") between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is greater than 5 and less than or equal to 6, according to the German Research Center for Geosciences in their running 30-day history data product.

not_P.title: Between July 17 and July 28, 2024, will the strongest geomagnetic storm have a K-index ("Kp") not greater than 5 or greater than 6?
not_P.body: This question resolves Yes if the highest Planetary K-index ("Kp") between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is not greater than 5 or greater than 6, according to the German Research Center for Geosciences in their running 30-day history data product.

para_P.title: During the period from July 17 to July 28, 2024, will the most intense geomagnetic storm register a K-index ("Kp") that exceeds 5 but does not surpass 6?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with a Yes if the peak Planetary K-index ("Kp") recorded between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is more than 5 and at most 6, as per the data from the German Research Center for Geosciences in their ongoing 30-day history data product.

question.title: Between July 17 and July 28, 2024, will the strongest geomagnetic storm have a K-index ("Kp") greater than 4 and less than or equal to 6?
question.body: This question resolves Yes if the highest Planetary K-index ("Kp") between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is greater than 4 and less than or equal to 6, according to the German Research Center for Geosciences in their running 30-day history data product.

not_P.title: Between July 17 and July 28, 2024, will the strongest geomagnetic storm have a K-index ("Kp") less than or equal to 4 or greater than 6?
not_P.body: This question resolves Yes if the highest Planetary K-index ("Kp") between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is not greater than 4 or is not less than or equal to 6, according to the German Research Center for Geosciences in their running 30-day history data product.

para_P.title: During the period from July 17 to July 28, 2024, will the most intense geomagnetic storm record a K-index ("Kp") that exceeds 4 but does not surpass 6?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if the maximum Planetary K-index ("Kp") recorded between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is greater than 4 and at most 6, as reported by the German Research Center for Geosciences in their ongoing 30-day historical data product.

question.title: Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is another presidential debate for the Democratic party expected?
para_P.body: This resolves to YES if a debate occurs among prospective Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It resolves to NO if no such debate takes place.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet cover the story at least 6 hours in advance? (b) Will there be no more Democratic party presidential debates?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post covers Joe Biden's dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before he officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient. This part will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

(b) Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO if there is such a debate.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet not cover the story at least 6 hours in advance? (b) Will there be more Democratic party presidential debates?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post does not cover Joe Biden's dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before he officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient. This part will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

(b) Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO if there is no such debate.

para_P.title: If Joe Biden were to withdraw, would a credible news source report on it at least 6 hours beforehand? Additionally, will there be no further debates for the Democratic party's presidential candidates?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be considered YES if a major and trustworthy news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post provides coverage of Joe Biden's withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours prior to his official announcement through a letter, speech, etc. Coverage from local news, conspiracy sites, or comments from individual users on Manifold will not suffice. This part will be marked as N/A if President Joe Biden does not withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

(b) This will be marked YES if there are no debates held among potential Democratic candidates (e.g., Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It will be marked NO if such a debate takes place.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Convention (b) Joe Biden drops out and a reliable media outlet covers it 6 hours in advance?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

(b) Resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post covers Joe Biden's dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before he officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Convention (b) Joe Biden drops out and a reliable media outlet does not cover it 6 hours in advance?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

(b) Resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post does not cover Joe Biden's dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before he officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens: (a) A subsequent presidential debate for the Democratic party takes place prior to the 2024 Convention (b) Joe Biden resigns and a reputable news source reports on it 6 hours beforehand?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be marked as YES if there is a debate involving potential Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It will be marked as NO in all other cases.

(b) This will be marked as YES if a major and trustworthy news organization like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports on Joe Biden's resignation with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before he makes an official announcement regarding his resignation through a letter, speech, etc. This market will be deemed N/A if President Joe Biden does not resign before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

question.title: Will the New York Knicks win the 2024 NBA Finals?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if the New York Knicks are crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It resolves as **No** for all other teams if they are eliminated from contention.

not_P.title: Will the New York Knicks not win the 2024 NBA Finals?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if the New York Knicks are not crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It resolves as **No** for all other teams if they are not eliminated from contention.

para_P.title: Are the New York Knicks going to be the champions of the 2024 NBA Finals?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if the New York Knicks are declared the winners of the 2024 NBA Finals, as per [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It will be answered with **No** if any other team wins or if they are no longer in the running.

question.title: Will the Los Angeles Clippers win the 2024 NBA Finals and the New York Knicks not win the 2024 NBA Finals?
question.body: This question resolves as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: (a) The Los Angeles Clippers are crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). (b) The New York Knicks are not crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It resolves as No if either the Clippers do not win or the Knicks win the championship.

not_P.title: Will the Los Angeles Clippers not win the 2024 NBA Finals or the New York Knicks win the 2024 NBA Finals?
not_P.body: This question resolves as Yes if either of the following conditions is met: (a) The Los Angeles Clippers are not crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). (b) The New York Knicks are crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It resolves as No if both the Clippers win and the Knicks do not win the championship.

para_P.title: Will the Los Angeles Clippers be the champions of the 2024 NBA Finals while the New York Knicks do not take the title?
para_P.body: This question is answered with Yes if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (a) The Los Angeles Clippers are declared the champions of the 2024 NBA Finals, as per [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). (b) The New York Knicks are not declared the champions of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It is answered with No if either the Clippers fail to win or the Knicks secure the championship.

question.title: Will either the New York Knicks or the Los Angeles Clippers win the 2024 NBA Finals?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if either the New York Knicks or the Los Angeles Clippers are crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It resolves as **No** if neither team wins the championship and both are eliminated from contention.

not_P.title: Will neither the New York Knicks nor the Los Angeles Clippers win the 2024 NBA Finals?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if neither the New York Knicks nor the Los Angeles Clippers are crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It resolves as **No** if either team wins the championship or both are still in contention.

para_P.title: Will the 2024 NBA Finals be won by the New York Knicks or the Los Angeles Clippers?
para_P.body: This inquiry concludes as **Yes** if the New York Knicks or the Los Angeles Clippers become the champions of the 2024 NBA Finals, based on information from [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It concludes as **No** if both teams do not secure the championship and are removed from the race.

question.title: Will Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will Israel not carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Israel will execute a lethal strike inside Iran prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will resolve to **Yes** if, after the date of this question's release and before May 1, 2024, reliable reports suggest that an assault ascribed to Israel and taking place within the confines of Iran has resulted in the fatalities of at least five people.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet cover the story at least 6 hours in advance? (b) Will Israel refrain from carrying out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves YES if both of the following conditions are met: (1) If President Joe Biden drops out before the end of the National Democratic Convention, a big and reliable media outlet such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post covers the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. (2) Following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following not occur: (a) If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet not cover the story at least 6 hours in advance? (b) Will Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves YES if at least one of the following conditions is met: (1) If President Joe Biden drops out before the end of the National Democratic Convention, a big and reliable media outlet such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post does not cover the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. (2) Following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: If Joe Biden were to withdraw, would a trustworthy news source report on it at least 6 hours prior? Additionally, will Israel avoid launching a lethal strike in Iran before May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as YES if both of the following criteria are satisfied: (1) In the event that President Joe Biden withdraws prior to the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention, a major and trustworthy news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post provides coverage of the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours ahead of Biden's formal announcement via letter, speech, etc. (2) After the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports suggesting that an attack linked to Israel occurring within the territory of Iran has resulted in the deaths of at least five people.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024, or (b) If Joe Biden drops out, a reliable media outlet cover the story at least 6 hours in advance?
question.body:
This question resolves **Yes** if at least one of the following occurs:

(a) Following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

(b) If President Joe Biden drops out before the end of the National Democratic Convention, a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post covers the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024, nor (b) If Joe Biden drops out, a reliable media outlet cover the story at least 6 hours in advance?
not_P.body:
This question resolves **Yes** if neither of the following occurs:

(a) Following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

(b) If President Joe Biden drops out before the end of the National Democratic Convention, a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post does not cover the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc. Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that either of the following will take place: (a) Israel conducts a lethal strike within Iran prior to May 1, 2024, or (b) If Joe Biden withdraws, a reputable news source reports on the situation at least 6 hours beforehand?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if at least one of the following happens:

(a) After the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, credible information suggests that an assault attributed to Israel has occurred within Iran's territory, resulting in the fatalities of at least five people.

(b) Should President Joe Biden withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention, a major and trustworthy news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports on the withdrawal with unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours prior to President Joe Biden's formal announcement of his withdrawal through a letter, speech, etc. Coverage by local news, conspiracy websites, or comments from individual users on Manifold will not suffice.

question.title: Will the Republicans Party of France (Les Républicains) form a political alliance with the National Rally for the 2024 French legislative election?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if before June 30, 2024, an electoral alliance or coalition agreement is officially announced between the Republicans Party (Les Républicains) and National Rally (Rassemblement National) for the upcoming [French legislative election](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_French_legislative_election), according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions). question.body: This question resolves as Yes if both of the following conditions are met: (1) The party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, 2024, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources. question.title: Will Ted Cruz be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ted Cruz is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Ted Cruz not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
