question.title: At the 2024 Olympics, will at least 5 countries win their debut gold medal?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

not_P.title: At the 2024 Olympics, will fewer than 5 countries win their debut gold medal?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if fewer than 5 countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

para_P.title: During the 2024 Olympic Games, will five or more nations secure their first gold medal?
para_P.body: This question will be considered **Yes** if at least 5 nations achieve their inaugural Olympic gold medal at the Paris Games, based on [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

question.title: Will Individual Neutral Athletes win ≥15 gold medals AND fewer than 5 countries win their debut gold medal at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
question.body: This question resolves to "Yes" if both of the following conditions are met at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games: (a) Individual Neutral Athletes collectively win 15 or more gold medals, based on the official medal tally published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other credible sources if IOC reporting is unavailable. If Individual Neutral Athletes are confirmed to have won 15 or more gold medals before the Games conclude, this condition resolves immediately to "Yes". (b) Fewer than 5 countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal, according to credible sources. If both conditions are satisfied, the question resolves to "Yes"; otherwise, it resolves to "No".

not_P.title: Will Individual Neutral Athletes win fewer than 15 gold medals OR 5 or more countries win their debut gold medal at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
not_P.body: This question resolves to "Yes" if at least one of the following conditions is met at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games: (a) Individual Neutral Athletes collectively win fewer than 15 gold medals, based on the official medal tally published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other credible sources if IOC reporting is unavailable. If Individual Neutral Athletes are confirmed to have won fewer than 15 gold medals before the Games conclude, this condition resolves immediately to "Yes". (b) 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal, according to credible sources. If at least one of these conditions is satisfied, the question resolves to "Yes"; otherwise, it resolves to "No".

para_P.title: Will Individual Neutral Athletes secure at least 15 gold medals while fewer than 5 nations achieve their first gold medal at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered "Yes" if both of the following criteria are fulfilled during the Paris 2024 Olympic Games: (a) Individual Neutral Athletes together earn 15 or more gold medals, according to the official medal count published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other reliable sources if IOC reporting is not accessible. If it is confirmed that Individual Neutral Athletes have obtained 15 or more gold medals prior to the conclusion of the Games, this criterion will resolve immediately to "Yes". (b) Less than 5 nations earn their inaugural Olympic gold medal, based on trustworthy sources. If both criteria are met, the question will resolve to "Yes"; if not, it will resolve to "No".

question.title: Will either at least 5 countries win their debut gold medal or Individual Neutral Athletes win ≥15 gold medals at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris 2024 Olympics, according to credible sources. (b) Individual Neutral Athletes collectively win 15 or more gold medals at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games, according to the official medal tally published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other credible sources if such reporting from the IOC is unavailable.

not_P.title: Will fewer than 5 countries win their debut gold medal and Individual Neutral Athletes win <15 gold medals at the Paris 2024 Olympics?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) fewer than 5 countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris 2024 Olympics, according to credible sources. (b) Individual Neutral Athletes collectively win fewer than 15 gold medals at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games, according to the official medal tally published by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other credible sources if such reporting from the IOC is unavailable.

para_P.title: Is it possible for at least 5 nations to secure their first gold medal or for Individual Neutral Athletes to achieve 15 or more gold medals during the Paris 2024 Olympic Games?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is met: (a) 5 or more nations earn their inaugural Olympic gold medal at the Paris 2024 Olympics, as reported by reliable sources. (b) Individual Neutral Athletes, in total, win 15 or more gold medals at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games, based on the official medal count issued by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) or other trustworthy sources if the IOC does not provide such information.

question.title: Will the Prime Minister of France belong to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as Yes if the party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

not_P.title: Will the Prime Minister of France belong to a coalition that is either New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as Yes if the party of the Prime Minister of France is either New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

para_P.title: Will the French Prime Minister be part of a coalition that is neither New Popular Front nor Together on July 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with Yes if the political party of the French Prime Minister is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, based on reliable information.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) The ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, and (b) The Prime Minister of France belongs to New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
question.body:
(a) This question will resolve as **Yes** if the ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will resolve as **No** for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, both sub-questions will resolve as **Yes**. This question resolves on the basis of [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

(b) This question will resolve as Yes if the party of the Prime Minister of France is New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) The ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, nor (b) The Prime Minister of France belongs to New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
not_P.body:
(a) This question will resolve as **Yes** if the ID political group does not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will resolve as **No** for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, both sub-questions will resolve as **No**. This question resolves on the basis of [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

(b) This question will resolve as Yes if the party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following statements will be fulfilled: (a) The ID political faction secures the highest number of seats following the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections, and (b) The French Prime Minister is affiliated with New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if the ID political faction secures the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will be answered with **No** for any other political factions. In the event of a tie between two factions for seats, both sub-questions will be answered with **Yes**. The resolution of this inquiry is based on [official announcements from the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or reliable media sources.

(b) This inquiry will be answered with Yes if the party of the French Prime Minister is either New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to trustworthy sources.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) The Prime Minister of France belongs to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024, or (b) The ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
question.body:
(a) The question will resolve as Yes if the party of the Prime Minister of France is not New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

(b) This question will resolve as Yes if the ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will resolve as No for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, both sub-questions will resolve as Yes.

This question resolves on the basis of official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) The Prime Minister of France belongs to a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together on July 30, 2024, nor (b) The ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
not_P.body:
(a) The question will resolve as Yes if the party of the Prime Minister of France is New Popular Front or Together on July 30th, at 12:00 Central European Time, according to credible sources.

(b) This question will resolve as Yes if the ID political group does not hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will resolve as No for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, at least one of the sub-questions will resolve as No.

This question resolves on the basis of official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports.

para_P.title: Is it possible that either of the following happens: (a) On July 30, 2024, the Prime Minister of France is affiliated with a coalition other than New Popular Front or Together, or (b) The ID political party secures the highest number of seats following the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be answered with Yes if the French Prime Minister's party is neither New Popular Front nor Together on July 30th at 12:00 Central European Time, based on reliable sources.

(b) The answer will be Yes if the ID political party has the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will be No for any other political parties. In the event of a tie between two groups for seats, both sub-questions will be considered Yes.

The resolution of this question will rely on official announcements from the European Parliament or credible news sources.

question.title: Will Switzerland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Switzerland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Switzerland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Switzerland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Switzerland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Switzerland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Switzerland going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Switzerland competes in a Semi-final and is formally recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Conversely, if Switzerland fails to qualify, the inquiry will resolve as **No**.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Portugal qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, and (b) Switzerland fails to qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Portugal participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (b) Switzerland does not qualify for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Portugal does not qualify or Switzerland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Portugal does not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, or (b) Switzerland qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following conditions are met: (a) Portugal does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Switzerland qualifies for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both Portugal qualifies and Switzerland fails to qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will happen: (a) Portugal makes it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, and (b) Switzerland does not make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This question will be answered as **Yes** if both of the following criteria are fulfilled: (a) Portugal takes part in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (b) Switzerland does not advance to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Portugal fails to qualify or Switzerland qualifies, the question will be answered as **No**.

question.title: Will either Switzerland or Portugal qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either Switzerland or Portugal participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Switzerland nor Portugal qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Switzerland nor Portugal qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither Switzerland nor Portugal participates in a Semi-final or is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Switzerland or Portugal qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will either Switzerland or Portugal make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if either Switzerland or Portugal competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Conversely, if neither Switzerland nor Portugal secures a spot, the inquiry will conclude with a **No**.
